title: Drawing, "Sketches.  The Niagara Falls", possibly 1856
medium: Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on green wove paper
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower right:  Lugt 457d, noir
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of Niagara Falls from the American bank
Verso: Vertical view of part of a tree

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches.  The Niagara Falls", possibly 1856.
possibly 1856. Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on green wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-148-b.
